column4: managu: I know what I did wrong, I deleted the file appelt for it, can I reload those files without reloading ubuntu totally?
Help I deleted the Applet for the gnome panel, how do I reinstall it without reloading ubuntu?
managu: thanks you helped me get a grasp on the terminology for what I did.
use the right click button on the panel and use the add to panel.. menu items.
